hopobject.name: FridgeAssist
hopobject.body: I am planning to develop shopping list application with rich graphical interface on LCD running on beagle board. The list is saved in SD/MMC card. User can add various grocery items. There is also a category to sort out grocery items example - produce, dairy product, soda. Also user can add date (on which groceries should be bought), if the date is passed (due), LED indicater turns red from green.
hopobject.shortdesc: Build Graphical Shopping list application on LCD running on beagle board.
